findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The contract allows minting an unlimited number of Sundae tokens.

findings.title: Deployer can add pool
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to add a pool, which may lead to unintended consequences or unauthorized access.

findings.title: Deployer can transfer ownership
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to transfer ownership of the contract.

findings.title: Deployer can withdraw tokens from contract
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to withdraw tokens from the smart contract.

findings.title: Deployer can withdraw BNB from contract
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to withdraw BNB from the smart contract.

findings.title: Deployer can set/update SATIN address
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to set or update the SATIN address, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Deployer can set/update stake time
findings.description: The deployer has unrestricted access to update the stake time, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Deployer can set/update interval time between rewards
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to set or update the interval time between rewards, which could lead to potential manipulation of reward distribution.

findings.title: Deployer can set/update dev address receiver
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to update the developer's address receiver, which could lead to unauthorized access or manipulation of funds.

findings.title: Deployer can update minimum and maximum transaction amount
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to modify the minimum and maximum allowed transaction amounts, which could potentially lead to unintended consequences or security risks.

findings.title: Deployer cannot mint after initial deployment
findings.description: The deployer of the contract loses the ability to mint new tokens after the initial deployment.

findings.title: Deployer cannot burn
findings.description: The deployer does not have the capability to burn tokens or assets.

findings.title: Deployer cannot block users
findings.description: The deployer does not have the capability to block users.

findings.title: Deployer cannot pause contract
findings.description: The deployer does not have the capability to pause the contract.

findings.title: Deployer cannot renounce ownership
findings.description: The deployer of the contract does not have the capability to renounce ownership.
